sub_title: Accelerating Your Freelance Data & AI Career.
summary: A background in business administration and a passion for machine learning & artificial intelligence solutions. Experienced creating and growing Data & AI related startups from scratch to growth- and maturity stage. Since 2018 responsible for Startup Accelerator to help Data and AI specialists startup their own company and work as a freelance consultant. Focused on Machine Learning Engineering, MLOPs Engineering, Data Engineering, and Cloud DevOps.

awards.title: Rookie of the year (Computer Futures, The Netherlands)

projects.title: ICAI Launch Pad
projects.description: Attracting, training and retaining Data & AI talent for The Netherlands. The Launch Pad program focusses on matchmaking of international PhD graduates and Dutch Data & AI companies. This with the goal in mind to have them find a job in The Netherlands, instead of leaving abroad after gaining a lot of valuable knowledge and living here for at least 4 years.

contributors.headline: Accelerating Your Freelance Data & AI Career.

projects.title: Van Spronsen & Partners
projects.description: At Van Spronsen & Partners I was involved in several projects focusing on marketing & strategy. These project include feasibility studies, concept development and business-/marketing plans. Additionally general management support (marketing & sales) was an important part of the position.

profile_positions.description:
Startup Accelertor is here to help you startup your own Data & AI (consultancy) company including a freelance project of your choice, to accelerate the next step in your career. Since 2018, we’ve worked with Data and AI specialists to find consultancy roles they love at companies like KLM, ING, Vattenfall and Randstad Group - in the field of Data Science, Machine Learning Engineering, MLOps, Data Engineering and Cloud DevOps.

In our vision, freelance consultants are The Future of Work. That’s a difficult step for some to take, but we’ve found a solution. We act as a stepping stone for Data & AI consultants who want to move away from traditional employment towards independency by being your own employer. We take away all the hassle by taking care of all steps to create your own consultancy company, towards more flexibility, higher earnings and projects that you like — without the risks of starting up all on your own. 

In short: We connect you with your first project at a company of your choice, all before ending your current employment contract. Instead of a fixed salary, you earn 75% of your hourly rate — around €12,000 per month plus many tax benefits because of entrepreneurship — depending on your ideal work-life balance. After one year, you know what it's like to work through your own company and be ready to fly on your own, without Startup Accelerator. The Future of Work, it's up to you!

Interested to see if freelance consultancy could be something for you? Feel free to fill in the questionnaire on the website, which takes 2 minutes of your time — or contact us by phone or email for any question you might have! https://www.startupaccelerator.nl.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Managing Director

profile_positions.company: Data & AI Consultancy - part of Consulta Network
profile_positions.description: A complete rebranding of Big Data Consulting Vacatures and Big Data Consulting Overzicht has resulted in our brand new platform. Follow Data & AI Consultancy for an overview of all relevant consultancy companies and their vacancies within your field of work. Visit our website for a new starting point in your search for a career in Data & AI consultancy: www.data-and-ai-consultancy.nl.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Venture building through identification of business ideas, startup creation and Venture Building-as-a-service. Providing solutions & services regarding business development, hiring, company leadership and (startup) advisory - with a focus on People, Data & AI.

Growth Accelerator has been established to accelerate growth for the Dutch Data & AI ecosystem, with a focus on both organizations and professionals. Working together with the Dutch AI Coalition (NL AIC) on the government's Strategic Action Plan for AI (SAPAI) to become frontrunner in Europe in the field of knowledge and application of Data & AI, for the benefit of prosperity and well-being.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: As a mentor and advisor helping young entrepreneurs & startups in both pre-seed phase and launch stage. Mostly involved in Rockstart's Emerging Tech (Artificial Intelligence) program as an expertise mentor for business development, strategic marketing, hiring and investment opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Startup Mentor

company.name: ICAI - Innovation Center for Artificial Intelligence

profile_positions.company: ICAI - Innovation Center for Artificial Intelligence
profile_positions.description:
ICAI Launch Pad is a collaboration between ICAI, Growth Accelerator and the Dutch AI Coalition (NL AIC), raising awareness about the Dutch labor market - and providing active guidance to PhD students on their career opportunities. Growth Accelerator leads the ICAI Launch Pad program and is responsible for matchmaking between Data & AI professionals and members of ICAI and NL AIC.

Together we aim at attracting and retaining Data & AI talent for the Netherlands. This requires a collaborative chain approach, in which the government, companies, educational- & research institutions and social organizations work together.
profile_positions.title: Program Lead (ICAI Launch Pad)

company.name: Xccelerated - proudly part of Xebia Group

profile_positions.description:
At Xccelerated we accelerate Data & AI competence of companies and young professionals with 1 to 3 years of relevant work experience to become experts in their fields. Our 13-month apprenticeships programs combine an advanced learning experience with working at one of our partner organizations, like Heineken, KLM, ING, Vattenfall, Randstad Group, Mollie and FedEx. 

At the end of each program (Data Science, MLE-MLOps, AWS Cloud Engineering or Azure Cloud Development) they'll have what it takes to join our partner organizations directly, without any strings attached - offering a long-term solution to eliminate the shortage of highly skilled Data & AI professionals. These training programs form an integral part for everyone joining Xccelerated — and are also available externally for current team members of other companies.

After building the organization from scratch within the Xebia Group, became responsible for the overall performance and development of the organization, leading a team of 35 highly skilled professionals. Acquired by Waterland Investment Group.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Managing Director

profile_positions.description: Drop-Inn is a Dutch non-profit organization (NPO) that supports disadvantaged young professionals in developing their talents, focusing on the cities of Amsterdam and Haarlem. The board of directors at Stichting Drop-Inn consists of 6 members and is responsible for monitoring the direction & performance of the foundation, in order to guide and set the pace for its current operations & future development.
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: BigData Republic is a big data consultancy firm established to challenge the market leader within The Netherlands. Just after the general proposition had been created and a first version of the website had been launched, I started as Business Manager to build the organization from there and became responsible for the overall performance and development of the organization. It involved staffing & directing a team and providing leadership towards the achievement of maximum profitability and growth in line with company vision and  revenue business. Raided Venture Capital and acquisition of the company including management buy-in & buy-out.
profile_positions.title: Business Manager

profile_positions.description:
NAVARA is a full cycle IT consultancy company. During my time at Computer Futures I had the task to recruit the first employees for their data science startup "3TEC: Navara Enterprise Analytics". Before the first employees started, I got offered the position as Business Unit Manager to accelerate the growth of the organization and became responsible for all business development activities. 

In this role I focused on strategy, marketing, sales, account management and recruitment. Other responsibilities included developing product- & service propositions, in addition to organizing events and giving presentations regarding data-driven solutions from a business perspective. Together with the CTO, translating company requirements into tenders with project objectives, use-case design, scope, budget and planning.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager

profile_positions.description:
SThree provides both permanent and contract specialist staffing services in the UK and Europe, Americas and AsiaPac and MENA regions. It operates under a number of different brand names with the five largest being: Computer Futures, Real Staffing, Progressive, Huxley and JP Gray.

At Computer Futures I started as a junior recruitment consultant. After extensive sales & recruitment training I had built the Data & Analytics market from scratch - under supervision of the sales manager. Became responsible for account management, guiding junior consultants and had been elected to be the Amsterdam office representative to renew the global branding- and client strategy together with the BeNeLux Director.

As a sales-driven and KPI focused organization, I received rewards for "Rookie of the year 2013, The Netherlands", "Top 3 Rookie of the year, BeNeLux & France", "MVP 2014, Amsterdam office".
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant / Account Manager
